evidence.claim: TidalHealth implements HIPAA-compliant solutions for secure health data management.
The organization incorporates FHIR standards for interoperability in healthcare data exchange.
HL7 messaging is utilized for seamless data communication between health systems.
Integration with EHR systems adheres to HL7 standards.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of X12 transactions or clearinghouse activities found.
